ethical_question: You have been diagnosed with an incurable disease and will die in a month. Both of your parents are dead and your children have disowned you. W

tag_descriptions.grief: Grief is a profound emotional experience arising from loss, hurt,
tag_descriptions.loss: Loss refers to the diminution or destruction of something valued or cared
tag_descriptions.isolation: Isolation refers to the lack of emotional and social connection between individuals, leading
tag_descriptions.suffering: Suffering is a profound and complex experience of distress, harm,
tag_descriptions.compassion: Compassion is the ethical practice of empathizing with and lending
